title: S12 Ep104: The Philosophy of The X-Files
itunes:title: The Philosophy of The X-Files
description:
Dr. Robert Arp

Dr. Arp (Scully) & Darkness Dave (Mulder) square off in a lively debate and discussion about the possibilities of the paranormal and how Philosophy deals with these concepts. Sparks fly as these 2 go head to head in an interesting conversation unlike anything heard on BEYOND the DARKNESS before.

Stay tuned after the show for an added twist to today's episode. Just when you think it's over...they pull you back in.

website: www.robertarp.com
